tooltip.adventuretime.scarlet_sword.obta: How to obtain: Can be found in an abandoned mineshaft.
tooltip.adventuretime.scarlet_sword.deta: A golden warrior's sword, damaged in the past. Despite its material, it boasts high durability. More suitable for combat than ordinary swords.
ability.adventuretime.parry.name: Parry
ability.adventuretime.scarlet_sword.parr: The sword can parry blows, absorbing damage. Each hit costs 1 durability, a critical hit costs 3.
tooltip.adventuretime.fourth_dimension_s: Scarlet from the fourth dimension. The sword's construction is complex to perceive, but it's clearly not of this world. The sword is fragile but has its potentials...
ability.adventuretime.reality_shift.name: Reality Shift
ability.adventuretime.fourth_dimension_s: The sword ignores 75% of enemy armor on hit.

Breaking the sword causes an extremely powerful explosion that reduces the durability of all items by 50% of their current durability for people within range. All creatures within a 40-block radius receive negative effects.
The sword can parry blows, absorbing damage. Each hit costs 2 durability, a critical hit costs 10.
tooltip.adventuretime.root_tree_sword.ob: How to obtain: Can be crafted from valuable resources.
tooltip.adventuretime.root_tree_sword.de: An extremely durable sword made from reliable materials. Ideal for combat.
ability.adventuretime.root_tree_sword.pa: The sword can parry blows, absorbing damage. Each hit costs 1 durability, a critical hit costs 3. There's a 50% chance during parry that the attacker's weapon will go on cooldown for 2 seconds.
tooltip.adventuretime.demonic_blood_swor: A sword of demonic blood, a family heirloom. Unusually strong against undead. Fireproof.
ability.adventuretime.demonic_blood_swor: The sword can parry blows, absorbing damage. Each hit costs 1 durability, a critical hit costs 3.
ability.adventuretime.demonic_aura.name: Demonic Aura
ability.adventuretime.demonic_blood_swor: While the sword is in hand, any undead deal 50% less damage to the wielder.
Damage to any undead is increased by 75%.
